question: Rukaiya Rangwala was appointed as the head of __________.
explanation: MobiKwik, mobile wallet service and payment gateway provider, announced the appointment of Rukaiya Rangwala as the Business Head of 'MobiKwik Payment Gateway'. Rukaiya has 15 years of experience in the technology and e-commerce industry. She was also responsible for the Marketplace division at Jabong. She helped to make it the fastest growing and most profitable division at Jabong.
